Articles.Content:
Hey All,
I've been away from KSP for a good whilst and holy crap has stuff really updated! Since I'm getting back into the game I've been working on rebuilding my mod library to about where I had it when I stopped. Problem is I see that almost all of the SpannerMonkey mods I had have broken/deleted downloads.......any idea what happened with that? Or where I can find SM_Stryker now? Thanks again!

Read the last status message on the profile: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/50907-spannermonkeysmce/

And regarding this post, no one is granted permission to continue the mods (at least for now, sounds like just no one ask yet)

Looks like it's not possible to get these mods right now, sry
